name: MODER
description: MODER: Copies or converts the entire contents of the data file on unit nin to unit nout.

cards.name: Mandatory
cards.description: Unit numbers configuration for the moder module.

parameters.name: nin
parameters.description: Input unit number. Positive for formatted, negative for binary. Range: 20-99.
parameters.help: Integer unit number for the ENDF input file. Typically 20 for input.

parameters.name: nout
parameters.description: Output unit number. Positive for formatted, negative for binary. Range: 20-99.
parameters.help: Integer unit number for the ENDF input file. Typically 20 for input.
